1565185775_1CBZY3cuYKeHZXEeHVxRFLmsCr3Um.body:
IMHO:

illegal text content:

Not much to deal with in this department since anything anyone says at any time is considered hate-speech somewhere everywhere by someone. 

Illegal images/video:

One possible solution is by only being able to share images/videos that have been posted in the centralized web. That way no illegal content is ever directly uploaded to the network and any video/images seen/shared are hosted in the centralized eco-system. 

You want to share an image? Instead of uploading the image from your hard drive, you share a link from one of the approved image sharing sites (imgur/reddit/whatever).  Similarly, you want to share a video in ZeroNet, you share a link to said video from the approved video sites (youtube/bitchute/whatever). 

The issue with this option is that it gives power to the centralized internet, but I think it would be a good first step in the right direction. Particularly since most of these sites are so enormous that it can be relatively easy to fly under the radar with this sort of setup. 

On a more philosophical note "illegal" content is only an issue because the government says if you are caught with it YOU go to jail, not the person that created or distributed it. If the government didn't throw you in prison for merely seeing illegal content, it would be dealt the same way it is dealt in other places. Moderators, filters, blocking widgets etc.

I browse /pol in 4chan and those asshole are always spamming porn and I find that content pretty offensive. But I just block it and/or deletes the content if it goes against the guidelines.

1565148747_1CDMTFbMEyBmGDW8eWUSZXQkca2Vu.body: I've been checking ZeroNet every day and so far I like it. The topics are a bit random but the tech works for better or worse and I have a good feeling about this tech.

I like the honesty, you have essentially described what it means to be a coward. In essence you can't even bring yourself to hate jews (funny how when it comes to jews you can't even use the word "hate") even if they objectively cause you more harm. Since they are stronger than you, and in your world view you submit to strength you roll over and show them your belly with pleasure. No hate towards an enemy who wishes to do harm to you and your family because as you put it they are strong and if you were strong like them maybe you would do the same thing right?. On the other hand you will harbor hate against a weaker enemy like the joke that is niggers because it's easy and carries no risks. You don't hate niggers because they are the most evil, or the most destructive, or the biggest threat,  but because they are weaker than you, and hating niggers is safe, comfortable.

Now, I don't pretend to tell you what to do, but for someone whose wold-view puts an emphasis on admiring strength, there is nothing more weak and pathetic than picking on a weaker enemy because you are too cowardly to pick on someone your own size. It is the equivalent of getting picked on at school only to go home and pick on your little brother because you don't have the balls to channel your rage against your real bullies. I would reconsider my beliefs if  i was in your position.
